

.. _file_necsim_Metacommunity.cpp:

File Metacommunity.cpp
======================



Contains the :ref:`class_Metacommunity` class for generating a neutral metacommunity. 


.. contents:: Contents
   :local:
   :backlinks: none

Definition (``necsim/Metacommunity.cpp``)
-----------------------------------------


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   program_listing_file_necsim_Metacommunity.cpp.rst



Detailed Description
--------------------

Samuel Thompson
BSD-3 Licence. For use with completed simulations from NECSim, using the SpeciationCounter program. Individuals will be drawn from the metacommunity for each speciation event, instead of creating a new species each time.
Contact: samuel.thompson14@imperial.ac.uk or thompsonsed@gmail.com 



Includes
--------


- ``Metacommunity.h`` (:ref:`file_necsim_Metacommunity.h`)
